introduction.p: The ContainerComposition property must be set to toolbars. The control template doesn't need to worry about how to rearrange toolbars.

prop.name: ToolbarTemplate
prop.p: The assigned control template instance must be or derived from <ControlTemplate/>.
This property defines the control template for toolbars inside this control. If this property is empty, the default control template for the ToolstripToolBar will be used.
